Default.voiceLine: No crew ever mutinied on me, none that still be breathin'. Ahahahaha.
Gather 'round mateys, so I can blow you up!
Just leaving this here...
I'll feed ya to me Kraken.
I'll gut you like a fish!
Ye about to take a long fall off a short plank.
Ye ever had your timbers shivered? Ye want to?

Merrymaker.voiceLine: Don't you all look cheery as a pack of cherubs... Let's fix that!
Time to cross some names off the naughty list.
Better prepare your stockings, 'cuz I'm shoving this coal down something!
Who deliver presents to baby sharks? Santa Jaws!
You'll never guess what's gets stuck in my beard! Cookies, candy canes, small street urchins... That damn thing's a mess!
I got a sack of presents here for all the good little girls and boys. Oh, look at that! It's empty! HAHAHARGGHHH!
Eh, someone's gettin' a permanent spot on me list...

Default.voiceLine: Have you heard the ska'drin proverb about honor? It doesn't exist! Ha!

Ameri-Khan.voiceLine: I come in 3 sizes: Large, Extra Large and Big Daddy.
Check out my guns, heck, check out the guns on my gun!
This burger disgusts me! Send it back! It didn't come with a little flag on top!
Why don't people like me? I'm just trying to give them freedom!
It's about to get PATRIOTIC AS F**K IN HERE!
Let me lay it out for you, your head is the ball, I'm the kicker: FIELD GOAL!
It's a bird- no...wait, it's an enemy!
Clearly, I'm not throwing enough guns at the problem.

Default.voiceLine: You will not collect any dragon balls!
Lizard? You will pay for your insolence!

Dreadhunter.voiceLine: Don't fear the reaper, I ate him, hahaha!
Come closer, I won't bite, yet.

Default.voiceLine: The Abyss does not joke.
Mess with the Raum? Get the horns.
All are insects in front of Raum.

Kraumpus.voiceLine: Who's been bad this year, huh? I have some gifts, to give you...
You get some coal, you get some coal, and you get. Some. Coal. Everybody gets some coal! Wahahahaha!
What did the naughty child get for Christmas? Mwahaha. Nothing except pain and death.
I spend 364 days a year stretching in preparation for Kraumpus nacht. Can't have these legs cramping up when I'm rampaging after all.

Crypt Guardian.voiceLine: I've existed for centuries mortal, and have yet to come across one as pathetic as you.
I like your eyes... Can I have them?
You've no idea how much milk I've had to drink to become this strong.

Default.voiceLine: Two minds are greater than one.
See what happens when we put our heads together?
Quick, grab my good hand!
'Ey, let's fist bump real quick. What could go wrong?
The sight of ya make me wants to destroy my glasses forever.
What do you call a scroll that's about the brain? A mind reader! Ha!
I got hit by a falling book once. I only have me shelf to blame. Hahahaha!
Sticks and stones may break me bones, but giant runic gauntlets will kill ya!
Woohoo!
I was once thrown to the wolves; now I lead the pack!
I was hoping for a real fight!
Your bodies burn, but it is your dishonor that stinks!
Let the bodies hit the floor!
You have no skill.
If I want a point, I will take the point!
You dishonor yourself by fleeing. Stand and face your death!
A wise man once told me 'Time heals all wounds.' It did not un-slit his throat.
Give a man a torch and he will be warm for a few hours. Burn his home to the ground while he sleeps and he'll be warm for the rest of his life.
Appear weak when you are strong and strong when you are weak, which for you is always.

Ebon Star.voiceLine: Let's teach them a lesson in pain.
I'll teach you a lesson you'll never forget.
Miserable form, pathetic skills, and a face only a mother could love, what are you even doing here?
As a joke I once stabbed my star pupil, no one laughed. But I'm sure he got the point.
My training is very simple: step one, wear cool armor; step two, get good.
I wear this helm to hide a lifetime of torment and sorrow. And to keep out the sand, that crap gets everywhere.
